collaboration: Available for Collaboration
hero.description: Focus on building modern web applications with clear backend structures, responsive frontend and production-ready systems.
about.description:
I am a vocational high school student majoring in PPLG who is passionate about web application development. I am accustomed to building systems from design to implementation, with a focus on clean backend structures, responsive interfaces, and well-managed data.

In every project, I prioritize code readability, structural consistency, and accountable solutions. Some of the applications I have created have undergone testing, database integration, and deployment to servers.
list.experience.parking_system.point3: Integrating OCR for vehicle plate numbers
list.experience.car_rental.point2: Managing data relations and input validation
role.experience.car_rental: Role: Backend development and user interface implementation
subtitle.projects: Some of the projects I have worked on
subtitle.education: Formal education that forms the foundation in understanding programming logic, system management, and web development.
smk.description: Beginning to delve into web application development in a structured manner, including the use of Laravel as the backend, basic understanding of data flow and database, as well as strengthening programming foundations through PHP and Python.
smp.description: Understanding the use of technology for productivity needs, such as data processing and information management using office applications. At this stage, an interest in the world of IT begins to develop, although programming is not yet a focus.
sd.description: Undergoing basic education that shapes learning abilities, discipline, and adaptation to digital technology as part of everyday life.
contact.description: Got a web project idea? I'm ready to collaborate and help develop it.
